name: Dalexandra Touch
title: Budtender
coverLetter: My name is Dalexandra Touch I have approx. 3 years experience in the cannabis field alone. I’ve worked at G6 Collective as well as G6 Deliveries, Goldie’s deliveries. I’ve also worked at cannabis cup events for Gold Coast and Queen of the Clouds.
experience:
G6 deliveries: approx 6 months 
G6 Collective 1 year 
Queen of the Clouds 1 year (on call) 
Gold Coast: a few months for events
additionalInfo: Also have shiftlead experience for a small restaurant. Cash handling experience, inventory management.
